Text: {d}nin-ŋir₂-su ur-saŋ kalag-ga {d}en-lil₂-la₂ lugal-a-ni\dat ur-{d}nin-sumun₂ ensi₂ lagaš{ki}-ke₄ nam-til₃-la-ni-še₃ a\abs mu-na-ru bur-ba\dem2 lugal-ŋu₁₀\erg nam-til₃-ŋu₁₀\abs he₂-su₃-re mu-bi\cop
